+#!/bin/bash
+
+# Additional Applications Installer for Nobara/Fedora
+# Installs: Google Chrome, Dropbox, Discord, Obsidian, Anki
+
+set -e
+
+GREEN='\033[0;32m'
+YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
+RED='\033[0;31m'
+NC='\033[0m'
+
+print_status() {
+    echo -e "${GREEN}[✓]${NC} $1"
+}
+
+print_warning() {
+    echo -e "${YELLOW}[!]${NC} $1"
+}
+
+print_error() {
+    echo -e "${RED}[✗]${NC} $1"
+}
+
+echo -e "${GREEN}=== Installing Additional Applications ===${NC}"
+echo ""
+
+# --- Google Chrome (DNF) ---
+echo -e "${GREEN}>>> Installing Google Chrome...${NC}"
+if ! dnf repolist | grep -q google-chrome; then
+    sudo dnf install -y fedora-workstation-repositories
+    sudo dnf config-manager setopt google-chrome.enabled=1
+fi
+sudo dnf install -y google-chrome-stable
+print_status "Google Chrome installed"
+
+# --- Dropbox (DNF) ---
+echo -e "${GREEN}>>> Installing Dropbox...${NC}"
+if ! dnf repolist | grep -q dropbox; then
+    sudo dnf config-manager addrepo --from-repofile=https://linux.dropbox.com/fedora/dropbox.repo
+fi
+sudo dnf install -y dropbox nautilus-dropbox
+print_status "Dropbox installed"
+
+# --- Flatpak Apps (Discord, Obsidian, Anki) ---
+echo -e "${GREEN}>>> Installing Flatpak applications...${NC}"
+
+# Check for flatpak
+if ! command -v flatpak &> /dev/null; then
+    print_warning "Flatpak not found, installing..."
+    sudo dnf install -y flatpak
+fi
+
+# Add Flathub if not present
+flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo
+print_status "Flathub repository configured"
+
+# Install Discord
+echo "Installing Discord..."
+flatpak install -y flathub com.discordapp.Discord
+print_status "Discord installed"
+
+# Install Obsidian
+echo "Installing Obsidian..."
+flatpak install -y flathub md.obsidian.Obsidian
+print_status "Obsidian installed"
+
+# Install Anki
+echo "Installing Anki..."
+flatpak install -y flathub net.ankiweb.Anki
+print_status "Anki installed"
+
+echo ""
+echo -e "${GREEN}=== Additional Applications Installation Complete! ===${NC}"
+echo ""
+echo "Installed applications:"
+echo "  - Google Chrome (DNF)"
+echo "  - Dropbox (DNF)"
+echo "  - Discord (Flatpak)"
+echo "  - Obsidian (Flatpak)"
+echo "  - Anki (Flatpak)"
